title: Couple of ID's
content:
Hi folks, need help with 2 fonts or similar fonts would help.

1st 'vandal'  
2nd 'Galaxy'

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203803im_/http:/typophile.com/files/vandal_4765.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203803im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Galaxy_6250.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Galaxy.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203803/http:/typophile.com/files/Galaxy.png) | 17.69 KB |
author: Joe90

comments.content: GALAXY: Samsung Imagination, Samsung's corporate typeface not available to sell, close to [Neutraliser Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203803/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hamburger/neutraliser-sans) and [Isonorm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203803/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/isonorm)
Thanks very much Ryuk...very helpful. Anyone any ideas on a similar font to the 'vandal jackpot'?? Thanks

Thought it was easy as [Trade Gothic Condensed Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203803/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic) for "VANDAL GOTHIC" but I was forgetting this /J. The only I have in stock that could fit these specifications is [Rama Gothic Expanded](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203803/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/rama-gothic) (Semibold or Bold). There are also:  
- [Akzidenz Grotesk Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203803/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-be) but it's not enough bold and following weights (Medium and Bold) have totally different /K, /P and /J designs  
- [Block Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203803/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/block-gothic-rr) but /K is off  
- [Helevetica Condensed Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203803/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica) close but overall design off
